attributes.action: Get the government to change the order of the alphabet to order of frequency
attributes.background:
The current alphabet is in the wrong order and its just made up. It does not teach kids how common the letters are. It should be changed to show the most common letters at the start. This is as follows:
ETAOINSHRDLCUMWFGYPBVKJXQZ
The government has the power to change the curriculum & should do so
